scripts.build: npm run copy:common && npm run build:v1 && npm run build:v2 && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && cpx ./engine-src/engineFilesVersion.json ./lib
scripts.build:v1: cd ./engine-src/v1 && npm install && cd ../.. && npm run copy:v1
scripts.build:v2: cd ./engine-src/v2 && npm install && cd ../.. && npm run copy:v2
scripts.lint: tslint -p src/client/ -c tslint.json src/client/**/*.ts && tslint -p src/server/ -c tslint.json src/client/**/*.js
scripts.test: npm run test:jasmine && npm run lint
scripts.update: npm run update:v1 && npm run update:v2 && node ./build/updateEngineFiles.js
scripts.update:v1: node ./build/generateAkashicVersionsFile v1 && node ./build/copyfiles v1 && npm run copy:v1 && npm run copy:common
scripts.update:v2: node ./build/generateAkashicVersionsFile v2 && node ./build/copyfiles v2 && npm run copy:v2 && npm run copy:common
